remarks: Specialization, with additional weakening (compared to ~ 19.2 ) to allow bundling of ` x ` and ` y ` .  Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes. (Contributed by NM, 23-Apr-2017.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 5-Dec-2017.)
statement:
speimfw.2 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
speimfw $p |- ( -. A. x -. x = y -> ( A. x ph -> E. x ps ) ) $.
